import React, {useState} from 'react'; function LoginForm({Login,error}){ const[details,setDetails]= useState({usernameOrEmail:"",password:""}); const submitHandler = e =>{ e.preventDefault(); Login(details); } return (
Welcome Back
Don't have an account? Create today!
setChecked(e.checked)} checked={checked} className="mr-2" />
Forgot your password?
) } export default LoginForm
